definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 She4 hui4 Ke1 xue2 yuan4

sentences.english: Dr Mae-wan Ho, Institute of Science in Society, London, UK.
sentences.chinese: 何美芸博士，社会科学研究院，伦敦，英国。

sentences.english: Gratifying results were achieved in the studies of philosophy and other social sciences.
sentences.chinese: 哲学社会科学研究取得一批可喜成果。

sentences.english: I spent a few days sampling the literature of social science.
sentences.chinese: 我花了几天时间浏览有关社会科学的文献。

sentences.english: Sports belongs to humanism and social science from the classification of scientific system.
sentences.chinese: 从科学体系的分类来看，体育学属于人文社会科学。

sentences.english: She has also taught at the Ecole des Hautes Etudes en Sciences Sociales in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 她还在巴黎高等社会科学研究学校任教过。

sentences.english: The law science, as a social science, has a long-term history and rich contents.
sentences.chinese: 法律科学作为一门社会科学，历史久远，博大精深。

sentences.english: Basides, author's self-citation rates in disciplines of humanities and social sciences were lower than natural sciences.
sentences.chinese: 而且，人文社会科学著者自引率比自然科学要低。

sentences.english: To understand some of terminology of social science, besides the communication.
sentences.chinese: 认识传播学以外的一些社会科学专门术语。

sentences.english: In the end, the paper analyses in - depth productivity of Chinese social sciences.
sentences.chinese: 论文最后对我国社会科学生产力作了较为深入的分析。

sentences.english: Theosophy is the result of the scientific development in the west society.
sentences.chinese: 通神学是西方社会科学发展的产物。

sentences.english: Classes in all subject areas except social studies are mixed-grade groupings .
sentences.chinese: 除了社会科学外，班级在所有学科都是混合年龄组的。

sentences.english: A semi-structured interview is a method of research used in the social sciences.
sentences.chinese: 半结构性访谈是社会科学使用的研究方法。

sentences.english: Welcome to College of Social Sciences, NTNU.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎来到社会科学学院。

sentences.english: I spend a few day sampling the literature of social science.
sentences.chinese: 我花了几天时间浏览有关社会科学的文献。

sentences.english: Effort will be made in Philosophy and social science to enhance the progress of literature and arts.
sentences.chinese: 积极发展哲学社会科学，繁荣文学艺术事业。

sentences.english: Once assumed the post of researcher and acting director concurrently of Institute of Social Sciences.
sentences.chinese: 曾任社会科学研究所研究员兼代所长等。

pinyin: ren2 wen2 she4 hui4 xue2 ke1
